item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 19, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Goboscript, text-based programming language, compiles to Scratch (77 points | 22 comments)
2. InventWood is about to mass-produce wood that's stronger than steel (82 points | 64 comments)
3. `This Printer company served you malware for months, called them false positives (66 points | 25 comments)
4. New research reveals the strongest solar event ever detected, in 12350 BC (171 points | 83 comments)
5. Show HN: Sshsync – CLI tool to run shell commands across multiple remote servers (17 points | 12 comments)
6. Spaced repetition systems have gotten better (862 points | 457 comments)
7. What does the end of mathematics look like? (11 points | 7 comments)
8. “There are people who can see and others who cannot even look” (130 points | 22 comments)

27. Comparing Parallel Functional Array Languages: Programming and Performance (76 points | 14 comments)

29. Mystical (394 points | 44 comments)
